name: Magic Missile
desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

name: Fortune's End
desc: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Thirst
desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

name: Reaper's Scythe
desc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 15/30/45 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Concussive Shot
desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

name: Midnight Pulse
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

name: Assassinate
desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

name: Pulse Nova
desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

name: Light Strike Array
desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
